name: ATV Fever
description:
ATV Fever is a fast and furious racing action game in over fifty events, and we challenge you to play it and not love it! Enjoy the great mix of environ¬ments and terrains, diverse vehicles and for¬mats. Aggressive and skilful driving is needed as players negotiate their way through numerous off-road and mountain ven¬ues in a quest to reach the winner’s circle and climb to the top of the driver standings.

Nine authentic all-terrain vehicles are at your dis¬posal as you battle the world’s best riders for circuit supremacy. Be the top ranked rider in the world!

Be all about “The Fever.”

  • More than 50 events
  • 9 authentic vehicles
  • Different weather events
  • 7 different locations
  • 20 different tracks
